actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The grick makes one Beak attack and one Tentacles attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 9 (2d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 12 (4d4+2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Monstrosity Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The grick is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The grick can climb difficult surfaces, including upside ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The grick's Stealth is 17 in rocky terrain.
